module.name: autobiographicalMemory
module.copypolicy: Released under the terms of the GNU GPL v2.0
module.description-long: Module to build, maintain and query a postgreSQL 8.3 database to use interaction history of the iCub. A database named 'ABM' need to be created on the local computer. (properties in the config file)

param.desc: To specify the module's name; all the open ports will be tagged with the prefix /name
Adress of the postgrSQL server (by default local)
Username of the DB for postgrSQL
Name of the postgrSQL DB containing the ABM

input.description: rpc port of the module, main input. Get the external request for the ABM
